name: Out of Space (itch) (andymcgamer)
description:
You are an adventurer stuck in a dungeon. It seems that in your looting, you triggered a deadly trap, and the entire dungeon is breaking down! Your only choice is to jump your way out!

(Oh and you also have time powers lol glhf)

Tap Space to Jump/ Attack (midair), Hold to Slow Time Down

You can bounce off rocks with your sword.

Submission for UCSB Game Dev Club's game jam Winter '23

For better performance, download and play :)

Credits:

Art: 

Luiz Melo luizmelo.artstation.com/
